name: Baseball - Not for the Squeamish Multiple Choice Quiz | Sports | 10 Questions

questions.text: Other than the New York Yankees, what other team did Yogi Berra play for?
questions.explanation:
New York Mets.

	Yogi changed buses and played for the Mets also.  He retired in 1965.

questions.text: Which of the following was NOT a Pittsburgh Pirates pitcher?
questions.explanation:
Jim Krebs.

	Krebs was a basketball player for the Los Angeles Lakers.  He was killed in a tragic auto accident in the early 1960's.  All others listed were on the 1902 Pirate roster.

questions.text: What team set the record in 1949 for fewest stolen bases in a season with a petty 17?
questions.explanation:
Cardinals.

	The Cardinals had potato-sack players in 1949.  Red Schoedienst led the team with a whopping 8 thefts.

questions.text: In what year did Pirate Bill Mazeroski win a Gold Glove?
questions.explanation:
1958.

	He also won another one in 1960 with the Pirates.

questions.text: When Joe DiMaggio retired, how many players had hit more career home runs than him?
questions.explanation:
4.

	DiMaggio retired with 361 dingers.  Only four players had hit more.  Ruth (714), Foxx (536), Ott (511), and Gehrig (493).  361 was quite a feat for a player of only 14 seasons.

questions.text: In 1980, what team had 3 players steal more than 50 bases in a season?
questions.explanation:
San Diego.

	The Padres had Gene Richards who led the team with 61, Ozzie Smith ripped off 57, and Jerry Momphrey stole 52.

questions.text: What player hit his 500th home run on July 14, 1967?
questions.explanation:
Eddie Mathews.

	Mathews who was playing for the Astros at the time, hit his 500th big one off Giant pitcher Juan Marichal on this date.

questions.text: Which of the following played 2581 games at the shortstop position?
questions.explanation:
Luis Aparicio.

	Aparicio of the Chicago White Sox accomplished this between 1956-1973.

questions.text: How many 20th Century Texas Ranger pitchers threw no-hitters?
questions.explanation:
4.

	The pitchers were Jim Bibby, Bert Blyleven, Kenny Rogers, and the great Nolan Ryan threw two.

questions.text: What pitcher did Mark McGwire hit his 500th home run off?
questions.explanation:
Andy Ashby.

	Ashby of the Padres dished this one up on August 5, 1999 while Mark was banging them for the Cardinals.
